Articles.Content:
Hello, I look for a full launch calendar for interplanetary with all possible travels. It's will be very nice if anyone can explain where i can find a spreadsheet or other...

Thanks and regards.

Edited August 13, 2013 by Braker
Answered
Launch Window Planner by alexmoon.

There is a mod called Protractor that you can download that will show you all the angles to the various planets from which you can work out your launch window. I attached one to a small buggy that I leave parked outside the VHB so I can see at all times when a launch window is coming up.

You can download it from the Space Port. Protractor for KSP

The advantage of this is that it's available in game.

Thanks for replies, i will use the alexmoon's tools instead of the mod beacause i would like to stay in vanilla.

Thanks again.
